summary: Update on ‘Of Lovers and Sinners’
title: Update on ‘Of Lovers and Sinners’
body: So it’s been a few months since I’ve updated Of Lovers and Sinners but I’ve finally sat down again to work on it. There isn’t much to blame beyond university studies and procrastination, but with university looming again in a few weeks - I have decided to try and finish the story as quickly as possible. Mostly because I need to finish something because I’m in such a lull between different works, but it’s also because I like to work on different projects for different fandoms soon! So keep an eye out for those! I’ll see if I can complete the third chapter of OLS sometime by the end of these week! Super excited to see where this goes :)

blog.name: greatergrindelgood
blog.title: Here for the Grindeldore tbh
blog.description: tfw watching FBCOG motivates you to make a Tumblr. she/her, UK, lesbian. INTJ. Slytherin? Ravenclaw? Who knows. Let's talk about anything. Seriously, anything. :)

summary: Bathilda on Grindeldore
body:
Bathilda on Grindeldore

Okay, I was having a look around the wiki, and there is definitely something up in this letter from Lily to Sirius. 

Book version:

Page One: Bathilda drops in most days, she’s a fascinating old thing with the most amazing stories about Dumbledore, I’m not sure he’d be pleased if he knew! I don’t know how much to believe, actually, because it seems incredible that Dumbledore–

(From wiki: The second page of the letter was missing, leaving the last portion of the letter to be cut off. Harry searched the room for the last part of the letter, but was unable to find it).

Another page: –could ever have been friends with Gellert Grindelwald. I think her mind’s going, personally!“

Film version:

"By the way, Bathilda tells the most amazing stories about our old headmaster. I don’t know how much to believe. Can it really be true that Dumbledore–”

–

There is definitely, definitely, definitely something going on here. In both versions, there’s a part cut off after “because it seems incredible that Dumbledore–”/”Can it really be true that Dumbledore–” that we never get to see.

Dumbledore was literally the Secret-Keeper of Grimmauld Place, so it’s very possible that he went through those letters during his time there and decided to, ahem, censor parts before Harry & co stumbled across them. 

There are a lot of interpretations that can be had from this, to be honest. Perhaps it’s not about Grindelwald at all, even though it’s been replaced with a part about him, but some other secret from the past he’d like to keep covered up.

I really do believe Grindeldore has been lying in wait since Deathly Hallows, however. And I actually love JKR so much.

summary: Os Crimes de Grindelwald cai para terceiro lugar na bilheteria brasileira
title: Os Crimes de Grindelwald cai para terceiro lugar na bilheteria brasileira
description:
Em sua quinta semana em exibição nos cinemas, Animais Fantásticos: Os Crimes de Grindelwald caiu mais uma posição na bilheteria brasileira, ocupando o terceiro lugar.

Entre 13 e 16 de dezembro, o filme arrecadou R$ 960 mil, somando R$ 57 milhões de renda total. Em primeiro lugar ficou Aquaman, que em seu fim de semana de estréia arrecadou R$ 29 milhões, seguido de Bohemian Rhapsody, que arrecadou R$ 1,3 milhões.

(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

Arrecadação no Brasil:

1° semana: R$ 22 milhões
2° semana: R$ 8,4 milhões
3° semana: R$ 4,7 milhões
4° semana: R$ 3 milhões
5° semana: R$ 960 mil

Na bilheteria dos Estados Unidos, Os Crimes de Grindelwald ficou em nono lugar. Mundialmente, o filme já arrecadou 595 milhões de dólares, sendo 151 milhões nos EUA.

The post Os Crimes de Grindelwald cai para terceiro lugar na bilheteria brasileira appeared first on Potterish.com.

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

summary:
Scorpius Malfoy
Slytherin 
Albus Potter and Rose Weasley’s best friend
He argues with Rose a lot
But is secretly in love with...
body:
Scorpius Malfoy

  • Slytherin
  • Albus Potter and Rose Weasley’s best friend
  • He argues with Rose a lot
  • But is secretly in love with her
  • Sarcastic sense of humor
  • But a very sweet boy
  • Draco and Astoria decided to raise him with the idea that every wizards or human being is equal. They did not want to repeat the toxic usual Malfoy education
  • At first the Weasley-Potter family wasn’t really happy to see Scorpius hanging out with their children but at the end they became quite fond of him
  • He is chaser in the Slytherin Quidditch Team

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

tags: fantastic beasts the crimes of grindlewald
summary: Fantastic Beasts Theory
body:
Fantastic Beasts Theory

So in The Crimes of Grindlewald, right after the traitor ministry agent kills the old half elf nursemaid in front of Creedence, we see Creedence playing with a sickly baby bird that we later learn, at the end when Grindlewald says Creedence is a Dumbledore, is a Phoenix. Now, personally I’m not really into the fact that Aurelius Dumbledore is a thing at all, so here’s my theory:

First, the background info; Leta gets sent to America with baby Corvus, switches him out with baby Creedence, the ship goes down, Creedence’s aunt tried desperately to save her baby (who was not actually her baby), Corvus and Creedence’s aunt dies, Creedence is sent to America and placed in the care of Mrs. Barebone, he is taught to suppress his magic and becomes an Obscurial.

Since Creedence joined the circus, and the circus had lots of exotic creatures and oddities, he found the baby Phoenix at the circus. Maybe it’s mother, one of the attractions at the circus, had died or something, so this is just a random young man finding a random Phoenix, doesn’t need to connect to Dumbledore.

Grindlewald made the blood pact with Dumbledore, meaning now he can’t fight his greatest enemy and he’s the only one powerful enough to do so. Also, Grindlewald’s whole deal is lying and manipulation, telling you what you want to hear and convincing you that you have a common goal. It’s what he did to Queenie, it’s what he did to his followers, and it’s what he’s doing to Creedence. Creedence wants identity, belonging, security, and Grindlewald wants a super powerful wizard on his side, powerful enough and with motive to kill his rival, Albus Dumbledore, so he gives Creedence a name, an identity, a place to belong, and he gives him a way to secure his life, by killing this “brother” of his whom he doesn’t know anything about but who wanted to see him suffer, so says Grindlewald.

Grindlewald didn’t want what was best for Creedence. He wanted an attack dog.

So in The Crimes of Grindlewald, right after the traitor ministry agent kills the old half elf nursemaid in front of Creedence, we see Creedence playing with a sickly baby bird that we later learn, at the end when Grindlewald says Creedence is a Dumbledore, is a Phoenix. Now, personally I’m not really into the fact that Aurelius Dumbledore is a thing at all, so here’s my theory:

First, the background info; Leta gets sent to America with baby Corvus, switches him out with baby Creedence, the ship goes down, Creedence’s aunt tried desperately to save her baby (who was not actually her baby), Corvus and Creedence’s aunt dies, Creedence is sent to America and placed in the care of Mrs. Barebone, he is taught to suppress his magic and becomes an Obscurial.

Since Creedence joined the circus, and the circus had lots of exotic creatures and oddities, he found the baby Phoenix at the circus. Maybe it’s mother, one of the attractions at the circus, had died or something, so this is just a random young man finding a random Phoenix, doesn’t need to connect to Dumbledore.

Grindlewald made the blood pact with Dumbledore, meaning now he can’t fight his greatest enemy and he’s the only one powerful enough to do so. Also, Grindlewald’s whole deal is lying and manipulation, telling you what you want to hear and convincing you that you have a common goal. It’s what he did to Queenie, it’s what he did to his followers, and it’s what he’s doing to Creedence. tags: harry potter and methods of rationality
summary: #gaycember — day 18 — Harry Potter (Harry Potter and Methods of Rationality) This Harry is to young to be gay or straight, but...
caption:
#gaycember — day 18 — Harry Potter (Harry Potter and Methods of Rationality)

This Harry is to young to be gay or straight, but he definitily deserves to have his own day in gaycember because of his opinions (you can read my favourite quote below.)

Ok, tbh I had to mention and advertise my favourite book/fanfic by Eliezer Yudkowsky (he has ~4 books and all of them make you see the world in different but extremely logical and rational way). The book’s site is hpmor, it’s translated into different languages. I’ll be really really happy if someone of my followers will yield to my advice and read it.


“All right,” she said. “It’s a subtle thing… but worrying. How can I put this… Mr. Potter, have you read many books that young children are not meant to read?”
“I’ve read all of them.”
“Of course you have. Well… I don’t quite understand it myself, but for so long as Severus has been employed in this school, stalking about in that awful stained cloak, there has been a certain sort of girl that stares at him with longing eyes -”
“You say that like it’s a bad thing?” Harry said. “I mean, if there’s one thing I did understand from those books, it’s that you’re not supposed to question people’s preferences.”
Professor McGonagall gave Harry a very strange look.
“I mean,” Harry said again, “from what I’ve read, when I’m a bit older there’s something like a 10% chance that I’ll find Professor Snape attractive, and the important thing is for me to just accept whatever I -”

summary: Merlin and The Marauders
title: Merlin and The Marauders
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2S6dvy4

by PrincessPersephone123

Merlin is a teacher in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry imparting his wide and incredible knowledge of magic to young witches and wizards.

But this time he is in disguise as Dragoon The Great.

Merlin has been serving for a few years when four mischievous and good hearted boys with a love for trouble and recklessness enter Hogwarts and makes him remember his past which he tries so desperately to forget.

Words: 2142, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Merlin (TV), Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, The Marauders - Fandom
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Merlin (Merlin), James Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, Peter Pettigrew, Lily Evans Potter, Severus Snape, Portrait Merlin, Albus Dumbledore, Minerva McGonagall, Dragoon the Great, Marlene McKinnon, Mary Macdonald, Frank Longbottom, Alice Longbottom, Tom Riddle | Voldemort, Gryffindor Students, Hufflepuff Students, Ravenclaw Students, Slytherin Students
  • Relationships: Merlin/Arthur Pendragon (Merlin), Gwen/Arthur Pendragon (Merlin), Gwaine/Merlin (Merlin), Lancelot/Merlin (Merlin), Sirius Black/James Potter, Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, Sirius Black & Remus Lupin & Peter Pettigrew & James Potter & Lily Evans Potter, James Potter & Lily Evans Potter, Lily Evans Potter/Severus Snape, Regulus Black/Sirius Black

Merlin is a teacher in Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry imparting his wide and incredible knowledge of magic to young witches and wizards.

Merlin has been serving for a few years when four mischievous and good hearted boys with a love for trouble and recklessness enter Hogwarts and makes him remember his past which he tries so desperately to forget.

tags: this has been sitting in my drats for 590 years
its not getting any funnier so here you are
summary:
Harry: *staring at Draco Malfoy’s dot on the maurader’s map, muttering* what are you up to, Malfoy?
Draco: *from across the...
body:
Harry: *staring at Draco Malfoy’s dot on the maurader’s map, muttering* what are you up to, Malfoy?

Draco: *from across the common room* we’re literally in the same room, Potter. You can see me completing my Potions essay. 

Harry: *still staring at the marauder’s map* hmmmm
